project_plan.name: Simple Contact Book in Python
project_plan.description: Implement a contact book application that allows users to add, search, update, and delete contacts, storing the data in a JSON file and providing terminal interactions.

task.name: Implement the functionality to add a new contact
Implement the functionality to search for a contact
Implement the functionality to update an existing contact
Implement the functionality to delete a contact
Implement the functionality to load contacts from a JSON file
Implement the functionality to save contacts to a JSON file
Write tests for each of the functionalities above
Execute tests on all implemented functionalities to ensure that they work correctly
